subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के अधिकार भूमिका क्या है?
explanation_en: Hindi is the official language of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के अधिकार भूमिका हिंदी है।

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary industry of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Tourism is the primary industry of Rajasthan.
